sent.orig: Hence in the wise leader's plans, considerations of advantage and of disadvantage will be blended together.
sent.trans: 是故智者之虑，必杂于利害。

sent.orig: Hence this cape is the first envoy to greet the sun.
sent.trans: 因此这海角成为迎接太阳的第一位使者。

sent.orig: Hence, attempts to hasten the significant task is uncalled for.
sent.trans: 因此这种千秋大业的工作，是急不来的。

sent.orig: She never promised me at that first time and hence she did not break her promise!
sent.trans: 第一次她根本就没有答应我，因此她也并没有破约！

sent.orig: Hence it would be better to adopt the term of relative arbitrariness in these fields.
sent.trans: 文章意在论证无论是在单个字符的音义层面还是在声音和概念的切分问题上，绝对任意性是站不住脚的，而相对任意性这一说法似乎更为贴切。
